30#ifndef DRM_ATOMIC_HELPER_H_
31#define DRM_ATOMIC_HELPER_H_
32
33#include <drm/drm_crtc.h>
34
35struct drm_atomic_state;
36
37int drm_atomic_helper_check_modeset(struct drm_device *dev,
38 struct drm_atomic_state *state);
39int drm_atomic_helper_check_planes(struct drm_device *dev,
40 struct drm_atomic_state *state);
41int drm_atomic_helper_check(struct drm_device *dev,
42 struct drm_atomic_state *state);
43int drm_atomic_helper_commit(struct drm_device *dev,
44 struct drm_atomic_state *state,
45 bool async);
46
47void drm_atomic_helper_wait_for_vblanks(struct drm_device *dev,
48 struct drm_atomic_state *old_state);
49
50void
51drm_atomic_helper_update_legacy_modeset_state(struct drm_device *dev,
52 struct drm_atomic_state *old_state);
53
54void drm_atomic_helper_commit_modeset_disables(struct drm_device *dev,
55 struct drm_atomic_state *state);
56void drm_atomic_helper_commit_modeset_enables(struct drm_device *dev,
57 struct drm_atomic_state *old_state);
58
59int drm_atomic_helper_prepare_planes(struct drm_device *dev,
60 struct drm_atomic_state *state);
61void drm_atomic_helper_commit_planes(struct drm_device *dev,
62 struct drm_atomic_state *state,
63 bool active_only);
64void drm_atomic_helper_cleanup_planes(struct drm_device *dev,
65 struct drm_atomic_state *old_state);
66void drm_atomic_helper_commit_planes_on_crtc(struct drm_crtc_state *old_crtc_state);
67
68void drm_atomic_helper_swap_state(struct drm_device *dev,
69 struct drm_atomic_state *state);
70
71/* implementations for legacy interfaces */
72int drm_atomic_helper_update_plane(struct drm_plane *plane,
73 struct drm_crtc *crtc,
74 struct drm_framebuffer *fb,
75 int crtc_x, int crtc_y,
76 unsigned int crtc_w, unsigned int crtc_h,
77 uint32_t src_x, uint32_t src_y,
78 uint32_t src_w, uint32_t src_h);
79int drm_atomic_helper_disable_plane(struct drm_plane *plane);
80int __drm_atomic_helper_disable_plane(struct drm_plane *plane,
81 struct drm_plane_state *plane_state);
82int drm_atomic_helper_set_config(struct drm_mode_set *set);
83int __drm_atomic_helper_set_config(struct drm_mode_set *set,
84 struct drm_atomic_state *state);
85
86int drm_atomic_helper_crtc_set_property(struct drm_crtc *crtc,
87 struct drm_property *property,
88 uint64_t val);
89int drm_atomic_helper_plane_set_property(struct drm_plane *plane,
90 struct drm_property *property,
91 uint64_t val);
92int drm_atomic_helper_connector_set_property(struct drm_connector *connector,
93 struct drm_property *property,
94 uint64_t val);
95int drm_atomic_helper_page_flip(struct drm_crtc *crtc,
96 struct drm_framebuffer *fb,
97 struct drm_pending_vblank_event *event,
98 uint32_t flags);
99int drm_atomic_helper_connector_dpms(struct drm_connector *connector,
100 int mode);
101
102/* default implementations for state handling */
103void drm_atomic_helper_crtc_reset(struct drm_crtc *crtc);
104void __drm_atomic_helper_crtc_duplicate_state(struct drm_crtc *crtc,
105 struct drm_crtc_state *state);
106struct drm_crtc_state *
107drm_atomic_helper_crtc_duplicate_state(struct drm_crtc *crtc);
108void __drm_atomic_helper_crtc_destroy_state(struct drm_crtc *crtc,
109 struct drm_crtc_state *state);
110void drm_atomic_helper_crtc_destroy_state(struct drm_crtc *crtc,
111 struct drm_crtc_state *state);
112
113void drm_atomic_helper_plane_reset(struct drm_plane *plane);
114void __drm_atomic_helper_plane_duplicate_state(struct drm_plane *plane,
115 struct drm_plane_state *state);
116struct drm_plane_state *
117drm_atomic_helper_plane_duplicate_state(struct drm_plane *plane);
118void __drm_atomic_helper_plane_destroy_state(struct drm_plane *plane,
119 struct drm_plane_state *state);
120void drm_atomic_helper_plane_destroy_state(struct drm_plane *plane,
121 struct drm_plane_state *state);
122
123void drm_atomic_helper_connector_reset(struct drm_connector *connector);
124void
125__drm_atomic_helper_connector_duplicate_state(struct drm_connector *connector,
126 struct drm_connector_state *state);
127struct drm_connector_state *
128drm_atomic_helper_connector_duplicate_state(struct drm_connector *connector);
129struct drm_atomic_state *
130drm_atomic_helper_duplicate_state(struct drm_device *dev,
131 struct drm_modeset_acquire_ctx *ctx);
132void
133__drm_atomic_helper_connector_destroy_state(struct drm_connector *connector,
134 struct drm_connector_state *state);
135void drm_atomic_helper_connector_destroy_state(struct drm_connector *connector,
136 struct drm_connector_state *state);
137
138/**
139 * drm_atomic_crtc_for_each_plane - iterate over planes currently attached to CRTC
140 * @plane: the loop cursor
141 * @crtc: the crtc whose planes are iterated
142 *
143 * This iterates over the current state, useful (for example) when applying
144 * atomic state after it has been checked and swapped. To iterate over the
145 * planes which *will* be attached (for ->atomic_check()) see
146 * drm_crtc_for_each_pending_plane()
147 */
148#define drm_atomic_crtc_for_each_plane(plane, crtc) \
149 drm_for_each_plane_mask(plane, (crtc)->dev, (crtc)->state->plane_mask)
150
151/**
152 * drm_crtc_atomic_state_for_each_plane - iterate over attached planes in new state
153 * @plane: the loop cursor
154 * @crtc_state: the incoming crtc-state
155 *
156 * Similar to drm_crtc_for_each_plane(), but iterates the planes that will be
157 * attached if the specified state is applied. Useful during (for example)
158 * ->atomic_check() operations, to validate the incoming state
159 */
160#define drm_atomic_crtc_state_for_each_plane(plane, crtc_state) \
161 drm_for_each_plane_mask(plane, (crtc_state)->state->dev, (crtc_state)->plane_mask)
162
163/*
164 * drm_atomic_plane_disabling - check whether a plane is being disabled
165 * @plane: plane object
166 * @old_state: previous atomic state
167 *
168 * Checks the atomic state of a plane to determine whether it's being disabled
169 * or not. This also WARNs if it detects an invalid state (both CRTC and FB
170 * need to either both be NULL or both be non-NULL).
171 *
172 * RETURNS:
173 * True if the plane is being disabled, false otherwise.
174 */
175static inline bool
176drm_atomic_plane_disabling(struct drm_plane *plane,
177 struct drm_plane_state *old_state)
178{
179 /*
180 * When disabling a plane, CRTC and FB should always be NULL together.
181 * Anything else should be considered a bug in the atomic core, so we
182 * gently warn about it.
183 */
184 WARN_ON((plane->state->crtc == NULL && plane->state->fb != NULL) ||
185 (plane->state->crtc != NULL && plane->state->fb == NULL));
186
187 /*
188 * When using the transitional helpers, old_state may be NULL. If so,
189 * we know nothing about the current state and have to assume that it
190 * might be enabled.
191 *
192 * When using the atomic helpers, old_state won't be NULL. Therefore
193 * this check assumes that either the driver will have reconstructed
194 * the correct state in ->reset() or that the driver will have taken
195 * appropriate measures to disable all planes.
196 */
197 return (!old_state || old_state->crtc) && !plane->state->crtc;
198}
199
200#endif /* DRM_ATOMIC_HELPER_H_ */
